nodes.text: Djeon Thilloch was a male humanoid Force-sensitive Revanite during Galactic War. Around 3637 BBY, he was stationed on the planet of Rishi, where he served as a commander at Revanite Valley Stronghold on Sky Ridge Island. He was killed by an ally of Theron Shan who infiltrated the stronghold to free captured SIS agent.
Djeon Thilloch appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan. He wears full body armor, making it impossible to define his species and appearance.
